translations: [内科] 脑电图，[内科] 脑动电流图

sentences.sentence: Electroencephalograms examine shows moderate or severe abnormality.
sentences.translation: 脑电图检查可发现中度或高度异常。

sentences.sentence: Objectives: To investigate the characteristics of the electroencephalograms (EEGs) of full-term healthy perinatal newborn in consciousness.
sentences.translation: 目的：探索足月健康围产儿清醒脑电图的特点。

sentences.sentence: Electroencephalograms (EEGs), that measure electrical activity in the brain, show network can detect whether neurons in the brain are on or off.
sentences.translation: 但对大脑神经电路扫描的脑电图发现，大脑神经有连接也有断开。
